MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG1 postcode area of Dumfries. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:01pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Amisfield Tower transformer and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:06pm on Saturday, 31 October 2020
